dev.simmons.entities

Interface Account

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CDAccount, CheckingAccount, SavingsAccount

    public interface Account
    The template associated with an account object.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Account.AccountType
      The AccountType representing the various accounts, as well as their interest rates.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      Static Account builder for building specific Account objects.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        int getId()
        Get the account_id associated with this record, if it's been retrieved from the database.
        Returns:
        The account_id representing this account. Negative and 0 values represent an unset ID and shouldn't be queried.

      • setId

        void setId(int id)
        Set the account_id associated with this record.
        Parameters:
        id - The account_id in the database representing this account object.

      • getBalance

        double getBalance()
        Get the balance of the account.
        Returns:
        The balance of the account.

      • setBalance

        void setBalance(double balance)
        Set the balance of the account.
        Parameters:
        balance - The new balance of the account.

      • deposit

        boolean deposit(double amount)
        Handle a deposit to this account, following any special rules for the account.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount you're depositing.
        Returns:
        True if the deposit is successful, false otherwise.

      • withdraw

        boolean withdraw(double amount)
        Handle a withdraw to this account, following any special rules for the account.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount you're withdrawing.
        Returns:
        True if the withdraw is successful, false otherwise.

      • calculateAmountAfterWithdraw

        double calculateAmountAfterWithdraw(double amount)
        Calculate the amount, if withdraw is successful, that would remain.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount you're trying to withdraw.
        Returns:
        The theoretical amount that would remain.

      • getOwners

        List<Client> getOwners()
        Get the list of owners associated with this account.
        Returns:
        The list of owners if one is available, null otherwise.

      • setOwners

        void setOwners(List<Client> owners)
        Set the list of owners for this account.
        Parameters:
        owners - The list of owners associated with this account.

      • getType

        Account.AccountType getType()
        Get the enum AccountType that is associated with this object.
        Returns:
        The AccountType value.

      • getDiagnostics

        java.lang.String getDiagnostics()
        Get diagnostic information associated with this account.
        Returns:
        The formatted string with the diagnostic information.

      • accountFactory

        static Account accountFactory(java.lang.String type)
        Static Account builder for building specific Account objects based on their AccountType
        Parameters:
        type - The string containing one of the enum AccountType names representing this Account's type.
        Returns:
        The account created, or null if the string is not recognized.

      • accountFactory

        static Account accountFactory(int ordinal)
        Static Account builder for building specific Account objects. Currently: 1 - Checking, 2 - Savings, 3 - CD
        Parameters:
        ordinal - The ordinal representing which account type to create.
        Returns:
        The account created, or null if the ordinal is not recognized.
